channel.title: mysql5.6 on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in mysql5.6 on Vegetable Programing

item.title: Nothing downtime with migrating MySQL
item.description: Resolution Intended in Avoiding MySQL ALTER table downtime. In my case of runnning 5.6, I can use ..., ALGORITHM=INPLACE, LOCK=NONE. In details MySQL :: MySQL 5.6 Reference Manual :: 14.13.1 Online DDL Operations. But according to MySQL create index with LOCK=NONE still locks a table - Database Administrators Stack Exchange, you can’t this way.

item.title: ユーザ、DBの追加
item.description: DB作成 (データベース作成) mysql> CREATE DATABASE dbname; DB名は「`」で囲まない ユーザー作成 (データベースユーザー作成とアクセス権限付与) mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON dbname.* TO dbuser@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'dbpassword';
